data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Cesar to agree with you and with one another.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cesar, Colombia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Cesar to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Cesar, Colombia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Cesar, Colombia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Embera-Baudo people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Cesar, Colombia to the gospel today.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Cesar, Colombia to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Spirit, of the 1,073,126 people in the state of Cesar who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.
